properties.name: gms.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: [Optional | default = SecretForGeneratingTheJWTs] Defines the secret to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: [Optional | default = 604800000] Defines the expiration time to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_type
properties.description: [Optional | default = Bearer] Defines the token type for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.header
properties.description: [Optional | default = Authorization] Defines the header for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.sign_up_url
properties.description: [Mandatory | default = /sign-up] Defines the url for signing up the user.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.authorities_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = authorities] Defines the holder for the authenticated user's authorities.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.expiration_time_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = expiration_time] Defines the holder for the expiration_time value sent in the 'login' response.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.issued_time_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = issued_at] Defines the holder for the issued_at value sent in the 'login' response.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.sign_in_url
properties.description: [Optional | default = /login] Defines the url for logging in the user.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.sign_out_url
properties.description: [Optional | default = /logout] Defines the url for logging out the user.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_type_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = token_type] Defines the holder for the security.gms.jwt.token_type.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = access_token] Defines the token holder for retrieving the JWT which should be used in further requests.

properties.name: gms.application.env
properties.description: [Optional | default = Development] Defines the environment in which the application is running.

properties.name: gms.user.default.name
properties.description: [Optional | default = Admin] Defines name for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.lastName
properties.description: [Optional | default = Default] Defines last name for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.username
properties.description: [Optional | default = admin] Defines username for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.password
properties.description: [Optional | default = admin] Defines password for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.email
properties.description: [Optional | default = admin@gms.com] Defines email for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.name
properties.description: [Optional | default = HOME] Defines name for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.username
properties.description: [Optional | default = home] Defines username for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.description
properties.description: [Optional | default = Default entity] Defines description for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.label
properties.description: [Optional | default = ROLE_ADMIN] Defines the label for the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.description
properties.description: [Optional | default = Default role] Defines the description for the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.enabled
properties.description: [Optional | default = true] Defines whether the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up is enabled or not.

properties.name: gms.config.multi-entity
properties.description: [Optional | default = false] Defines whether application will support multiple entity registration or not.

properties.name: gms.config.user-registration-allowed
properties.description: [Optional | default = true] Defines whether application will allow new users to be register via registration form or not.

properties.name: gms.config.api-docs.basePath
properties.description: [Optional | default = true] Defines the base path for the api documentation resources.

properties.name: gms.config.page.size
properties.description: [Optional | default = 1] Defines the number of pages to chow when doing request to resources lists.

properties.name: gms.config.page.size_holder
properties.description: [Optional | default = size] Defines the var where the number of pages to chow when doing request to resources lists will be placed.
